author: stahlleiton
body:
#### PR description:

So far there were two HGCal rechit data format directories: HGCalRecHit (including HGCalRecHitHost and HGCalRecHitSoA) and HGCalReco (including HGCalSoARecHits). The HGCalRecHit data formats were used in test beam workflows while HGCalReco formats are used by the TICL reconstruction.

This PR adapts the HGCalSoARecHits format to support the processing of testbeam data (modifying accordingly the HGCalRecHitCalibrationAlgorithms and HGCalRecHitProducers to use HGCalReco formats instead of the HGCalRecHit formats) and allows to run offline reconstruction (up to layer clusters at the moment). Thus, the HGCalRecHit data formats becomes obsolete by this PR.

Moreover this PR now apply energy loss and thickness corrections to the RecHits to convert charge (in fC) to energy (in GeV). See slide 912: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1554444/contributions/6545659/attachments/3078603/5448738/HGCal_rawdata_config_20250602.pptx-2.pdf#page=9 

And finally it sets up a new relval using as input 2024 HGCal test beam data, which requires the following cms-data PRs: https://github.com/cms-data/Geometry-HGCalMapping/pull/4 and https://github.com/cms-data/RecoLocalCalo-HGCalRecProducers/pull/1

@pfs @IzaakWN 

#### PR validation:

This PR can be tested using relval 77 with cms-data PRs https://github.com/cms-data/Geometry-HGCalMapping/pull/4 and https://github.com/cms-data/RecoLocalCalo-HGCalRecProducers/pull/1
title: Adapt HGCal rechit producer for HGCal testbeam data
